title: ELDEN RING
about: Elden Ring is an action role‑playing game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It features an open world with a dynamic day‑night cycle and a large, detailed environment. The game was directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki, with fantasy writer George R. R. Martin contributing to the worldbuilding. It combines the dark, challenging gameplay of previous FromSoftware titles with a vast open‑world exploration system.

title: NIGHTREIN
about: Nightrein drops you into a neon‑drenched metropolis ruled by corrupted titans. Dodge, parry and counter in tight, timing‑based combat while piecing together the city’s forgotten past.

title: DARK SOULS III
about: The darkly atmospheric finale of the Dark Souls saga. Fast, fluid combat, labyrinthine level design and brutally satisfying boss fights await any who dare to Link the Fire.

title: BLOODBORNE
about: Face your fears in the gothic city of Yharnam. Hunt nightmarish beasts, unravel cosmic horrors and confront the plague that twists reality itself.

title: SEKIRO™: SHADOWS DIE TWICE
about: Carve a path to revenge. In late‑1500s Sengoku Japan take on the role of the “one‑armed wolf” and master a brutal katana‑and‑parry combat system.
